content: a one skein crochet shawl/scarf that will work up in no time perfect for that precious skein of indie dyed yarn you have been saving copper beech is an easy pattern repeat for a narrow asymmetric shawl/scarf perfect for adding a stylish touch to any outfit includes a chart **materials** heyjay hand dyed yarn - earth 4 ply sock - 85% sw bluefaced leicester wool / 15% donegal nep - 100g/400m 4mm crochet hook you can use 400m of any fingering weight yarn or yarn weight of your choice and matching hook **measurements** shawl pictured measures 70 178cm x 58 147cm x 30 76cm after blocking
